org.opendaylight.protocol.framework

Class SimpleSessionListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.protocol.framework.SimpleSessionListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, SessionListener<SimpleMessage,SimpleSession,TerminationReason>

    public class SimpleSessionListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements SessionListener<SimpleMessage,SimpleSession,TerminationReason>
    Simple Session Listener that is notified about messages and changes in the session.

      • onSessionDown

        public void onSessionDown(SimpleSession session,
                 java.lang.Exception e)
        Description copied from interface: SessionListener
        Fired when the session went down because of an IO error. Implementation should take care of closing underlying session.
        Specified by:
        onSessionDown in interface SessionListener<SimpleMessage,SimpleSession,TerminationReason>
        Parameters:
        session - that went down
        e - Exception that was thrown as the cause of session being down

      • onSessionTerminated

        public void onSessionTerminated(SimpleSession session,
                       TerminationReason reason)
        Description copied from interface: SessionListener
        Fired when the session is terminated locally. The session has already been closed and transitioned to IDLE state. Any outstanding queued messages were not sent. The user should not attempt to make any use of the session.
        Specified by:
        onSessionTerminated in interface SessionListener<SimpleMessage,SimpleSession,TerminationReason>
        reason - the cause why the session went down
